description.narrative: Each year from 2012-2016, planning, monitoring and evaluation of UNICEF programming in CAR is conducted and approved with the government of CAR and key stakeholders., which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Economic And Social Policy General, Evaluation And Research, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, the social information system develops regularly disaggregated data on the situation of children, women and vulnerable groups at national and regional level, including in emergency zones.

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)

title.narrative: Central African Republic United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Central African Republic Humanitarian Action for Children Appeal (HAC)
Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals
Interagency Humanitarian Response Assessments and Plans
UN Sustainable Development Group Database of Common Country Analyses
UNINFO Document Database to search for Common Country Analysis and Cooperation Framework
Central African Republic Country Programme Document 2018 to 2021 Extended until 2022 (see extension 1)
Central African Republic Country Programme Document Extension 1
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Central African Republic 2021 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Each year from 2012-2016, planning, monitoring and evaluation of UNICEF programming in CAR is conducted and approved with thegovernment of CAR and key stakeholders.

description.narrative: Under the leadership of the Ministry of planning, CPD preparation was owned by the national counterpart. Joint efforts in inclusive participation at all major stages of the process has been instrumental for the adoption of the programme at the country level before the validation by the executive board (September 2017). | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Availability of national sex disaggregated data on child rights realisation, including data on CWD
